p: {% trans into lang %}Prayer of the day:{% endtrans %} Maximilian Kolbe

{% trans into lang %}All powerful and everliving God, we praise you that you turned our weakness into strength: as you called Maximilian Kolbe to give his life for a brother, grant us the grace to live in faithful witness to you, even unto death; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.{% endtrans %} {% trans into lang %}Amen{% endtrans %}
